name: Soul of the Sword
description:
Fight your way through beast-filled ruins and haunting forests on a quest to save a soul! As a wayfaring knight, you've found a powerful sword-one possessed by an ancient wizard of old. But taking the blade had drastic consequences-an ancient curse has been unleashed, sending you into an apocalyptic future filled with demons, darkness, and death. Find your way back to the past! Break the curse! Save the Sword!

Made for a Senior Project at New Vista High School, Boulder, CO.

All credit for music goes to Griffin McElroy and HOME. Buy their music!

Controls:

Arrows - Move

Shift - Jump

Space - Attack

R - Restart
